attributes.additional_details: The British government, claim to listen to us, but they do not take any further action other than the actions of them proceeding with their own plans and arrangements.
attributes.background: We have a problem that our voices and reasons aren't being heard by our British government and refuse to ignore us, by disregarding our issues, these people also claim to represent us. I am no longer standing by it!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.
